bibl.title: The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Volume XXVI (Nos 2438-2451)

series.title: Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No.

bibl.seg: Lobel E., The Oxyrhynchus Papyri. Part XXVI (Nos 2438-2451). (Egypt Exploration Society. Graeco-Roman Memoirs. No. 38.)
London, Egypt Exploration Society, 1961, 8°, xi-186 pp., XX plates.

C.R. par B.A. van Groningen, Gnomon 35 (1963) pp. 127-130. - É. des Places, Orientalia N.S., 32 (1963) p. 503. - Cl. Préaux, ChrEg 37 (1962) No. 73, pp. 191-195. - A. Tovar, Emerita 32 (1964) pp. 335-337. - E.G. Turner, CR N.S., 13 (1963) pp. 268-270.
